android.support.v7.internal.widget

Interface ActivityChooserModel.OnChooseActivityListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ActivityChooserModel

    public static interface ActivityChooserModel.OnChooseActivityListener
    Listener for choosing an activity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onChooseActivity(ActivityChooserModel host, Intent intent)
      Called when an activity has been chosen.

    • Method Detail

      • onChooseActivity

        boolean onChooseActivity(ActivityChooserModel host,
                       Intent intent)
        Called when an activity has been chosen. The client can decide whether an activity can be chosen and if so the caller of ActivityChooserModel.chooseActivity(int) will receive and Intent for launching it.

        Note: Modifying the intent is not permitted and any changes to the latter will be ignored.

        Parameters:
        host - The listener's host model.
        intent - The intent for launching the chosen activity.
        Returns:
        Whether the intent is handled and should not be delivered to clients.
        See Also:
        ActivityChooserModel.chooseActivity(int)
